roleset.name: decide
roleset.note: SETTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'settle' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'decide'. (from settle.01-v)

example.name: go hoosiers!
example.text: The National Association of Manufacturers settled on the Hoosier capital of Indianapolis for its fall board meeting.
example.arg: on the Hoosier capital of Indianapolis

roleset.name: resolve, resolution of dispute
roleset.note: SETTLE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls settle-89. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from settle.02-v)
SETTLEMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on settle-v.02. Corresponds to Vncls settle-89. (from settlement.01-n)

role.descr: what the settlement is (value or decision)

example.name: financial settlement
example.text: Moscow-1 found a way *trace*-1 to settle the country's $188 million debt.

example.name: death and taxes
example.text: ...if he had settled with the IRS.

example.name: lawsuits again
example.text: ...a $750 million antitrust suit which-1 [*trace-1*]-2 could be settled *trace-2* for one-third that amount.

example.name: args 2 and 3
example.text: it made a $ 75,000 settlement with Drexel , a record-tying finefor a securities-law matter in that state

example.name: just arg1
example.text: The OAS [...] is attempting to find a settlement of the current Panama political crisis .
example.arg: of the current Panama political crisis

example.name: both settlers together in arg0
example.text: But officials in Rome say the issue was legally resolved by a settlement between Italy and King Idris , deposed by Col. Muammar Gadhafi in 1969 .
example.arg: between Italy and King Idris, deposed by Col. Muammar Gadhafi in 1969

roleset.name: come to rest, or approach a steady state
roleset.note: SETTLE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls lodge-46. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from settle.03-v)

example.name: I am getting so tired of stock reports
example.text: On the Commodity Exchange in New York, gold for current delivery settled at $374.20 an ounce, down 50 cents.

example.name: start a settlement
example.text: [The town]-9 was originally settled [*]-9 by six different Lin and Shan families.
example.arg: by six different Lin and Shan families

example.name: causative
example.text: Certainly, the Oct 13 sell-off didn't settle any stomachs.

example.name: With end state
example.text: Eventually, John and Mary settled in Kansas.

roleset.name: and be quiet!
roleset.note: SETTLE_DOWN-V NOTES: Member of Vncls convert-26.6.2. Updated by julia, 11/2010. (from settle.04-v)

example.name: frustrated mom
example.text: No matter what I do, I can't get little Johnny to settle down.

roleset.name: put down roots, plan to reside somewhere for the long run
roleset.note: SETTLE_DOWN-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls, but see lodge-46. (from settle.05-v)

example.name: Both args
example.text: Madison seems like a nice place *WNADV*-2 *PRO* to settle down [*-2] for them , until they realise how vulnerable the city is to criminal activity and that they can build their own criminal empire here instead of working hardand earnestly on a real job , regardless of pay .
